page.title: 12Ebchester
page.content: Although Ebchester is a small village there are activities for young and old.Atoddler group,Youth Club, Discotheques,Old Peoples Lunches etc.The local churches,one C.OFE.and one METHODIST both have sunday schools as well as a Mother's Union.Alarge number of local residents belong to a Leek Club and take great pride in growing healthy and large leeks. The Village Trust and the Community Association play a very active part in village life.They not only provide entertainments,but watch over village property and surroundings.This latter job is very important as Ebchester sits amid some beautiful countryside which needs to be protected and preserve.There are a number of enjoyable walks in and around the village.
